diff_hunk:
@@ -13,9 +13,10 @@ def _assert_no_grad(variable):
 
 
 class _Loss(Module):
-    def __init__(self, size_average=True):
+    def __init__(self, size_average=True, reduce=True):
body: This is going to make all loss functions accept the `reduce` argument, while only `MSELoss` really supports it. Either only add it to `MSELoss`, or patch all other functions to raise an error if it's set to `False`
body_html: This is going to make all loss functions accept the reduce argument, while only MSELoss really supports it. Either only add it to MSELoss, or patch all other functions to raise an error if it's set to False
